General.Name: XiAn Global Printing Co Ltd
General.Description: Xi'an Global Printing Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of pharmaceutical packaging products in China and internationally. It offers packaging cartons, cartons and aluminum tubes, and other packaging products. The company provides its products for high-end boutique packaging and related packaging materials for fast-moving consumer goods, big health, fine chemicals, medical beauty cosmetics, electronic products, etc. Xi'an Global Printing Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Xi'an, China.

1.Name: Ms. Wei  Lin
1.Title: Deputy GM, Chief Accountant and Sec. of the Board
